issue.title: [CF 291] 'Only Stealable' and 'Show Variable Text' options are superimposed
issue.body:
On my mage, when making a buff/debuff icon, the 'show stealable' option covers up the 'show variable text' option in the configuration ui.  The texts are superimposed and garbled.  Initially, clicking the checkbox only toggles 'only stealable.'  If I close the config and open it again the checkbox then seems to toggle the 'show variable text' option.


> Posted by CurseForge user pacman7654 | Imported from CurseForge issue #291 | Raw

comments.body:
Argh, I always forget to compensate for class-specific settings.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
